original_text: that he may incline our hearts to him, to walk in all his ways and to keep his commandments, his statutes, and his rules, which he commanded our fathers.
korean_text: 우리의 마음을 주께로 향하여 그의 모든 길로 행하게 하시오며 우리 조상들에게 명령하신 계명과 법도와 율례를 지키게 하시기를 원하오며

sentences.original_text: that he may incline our hearts to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리 마음을 자기에게 기울이시려는 것

sentences.original_text: to walk in all his ways
and to keep his commandments, his statutes, and his rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 계명과 규례와 법도를 지키려는 것
